Creating plot from Orange R dataset 

Step 1 :
```{r}
# Download the library 
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```
Step 2 : 
```{r}
# Download data from R database
data ("Orange")
head (Orange)

```
Step 3 : 
```{r}
# Set a line plot, add the pointers, add title and name the variables in the plot
orangeplot <- Orange %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = age, y = circumference, color = Tree)) +
  geom_line() + geom_point(size = 1) +
  labs(
    title = "Growth of Orange Trees Throughout the Time",
    x = "age", y = "circumference")
theme_minimal()
```
Step 4 :
```{r}
print(orangeplot)
```

- The end -
